item.title: Trump visiting Iowa to kick off midterm election campaigning

item.title: Judge blocks ICE from deporting or transferring 5-year-old and his father
item.description: A federal judge on Tuesday temporarily barred federal immigration officials from deporting 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father.
